com.google.orkut.client.api
Class FriendTxFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.google.orkut.client.api.FriendTxFactory

public class FriendTxFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory for creating transaction related to friends. Use this class if you want to:

  • Fetch list of friends of a user
  • Send or Revoke a friend request
  • Accept or Reject a friend request
  • Remove a user from your friend list
  • Fetch list of pending friend requests

Author:
Sachin Shenoy
